title: How to start a tech networking business - Quora

response.answer_text: There are several people networking sites already, and they have different models and goals. Take a look at the following and see which looks closest to what you want to achieve: Find your people - Meetup  - face-to-face meetings with other people with common interestsStartup Jobs - tech for jobs in startupsIf that doesn't look like what you have in mind, check out List of social networking websites.

Networks already exist, and unless your idea has some USP that blows everyone out of the water, or that truly meets a need that your customers are lacking (or that you can have them perceive to lack), you'll be hitting a wall.
